name: Hush (itch)
description:
WASD - Controls the bottom character

Arrow Keys - Controls the top character

The goal of the top player is to find the bottom one, the bottom one has to find the key and then the exit.

I don't know if i will continue this, i was just testing lights and stuff but i do like some ideas i have.

Oh, and there is a hole around there that just kills you, left that there on accident xD
